class.name: Node3DEditorViewport
class.brief_description: Control used by the 3D editor to display 3D scenes.

method.name: get_camera_3d
method.description: Gets the camera used by the viewport.

method.name: set_message
method.description: Displays a message in the bottom corner of the viewport for a limited duration.

method.name: update_transform_gizmo_view
method.description: Updates the transform gizmo belonging to the viewport.

signal.name: clicked
signal.description: Emitted when any mouse button is clicked inside the viewport.

signal.name: toggle_maximize_view
signal.description: Emitted when the viewport is maximized.
